page.title: 04DAIRY FARMING
page.content: Mrs large is a Tenent Farmer on Manor farm,Church farm, and Grange farm which is a total of 500 acres.She has 240 milking cows which give 15 litres a day plus 100 calves. A female cow is called a hiefer all of her cows are Fresian cows. They are fed on grass pasture during the growing season.During the winter the cows are fed on silage which can be made from grass cuttings which are left to ferment. Mrs Large has been working for 34 years.Her family have farmed for 300 years they have farmed in Scotland. Mrs Large employed eight full time workers.In 1985 she employed only five full time workers. At her farm there is a dutch barn which she stores barley straw in.She grows barley and oil seed rape.
